title: fluid.umap
description: The `fluid.umap` object performs Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP) for dimensionality reduction on a `fluid.dataset`. It transforms high-dimensional data (e.g., 26 values from sound segments) into a lower-dimensional representation, useful for visualization or further analysis. Parameters like `numneighbours` and `mindist` control the embedding, influencing how global or local structures are preserved.
